CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 53 In order to evaluate the hole mobility of the resulting polymers , corresponding hole - only devices with configuration o f I T O / p o l y ( 3 , 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o l y -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO 3 / Al were fabricated and the hole mobilities were obtained by using the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) model.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| p-type silicon (3, 4-ethylene dioxythiophene:polystyrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS) |
| polymer |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| p-type silicon (3, 4-ethylene dioxythiophene:polystyrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS) |
| polymer |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

Explanation:

* ITO was identified as a material name as it is mentioned as a configuration (ITO/...) and it is a well-known conductive material.
* PEDOT:PSS is mentioned as a polymer and a material in the paragraph.
* MoO3 and Al are explicitly mentioned as materials.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 53 In order to evaluate the hole mobility of the resulting polymers , corresponding hole - only devices with configuration o f I T O / p o l y ( 3 , 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o l y -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO 3 / Al were fabricated and the hole mobilities were obtained by using the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) model.

* configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer / MoO3 / Al devices

These entities refer to the fabrication process and the measurement method, respectively, rather than material properties.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 53 In order to evaluate the hole mobility of the resulting polymers , corresponding hole - only devices with configuration o f I T O / p o l y ( 3 , 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o l y -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO 3 / Al were fabricated and the hole mobilities were obtained by using the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) model.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| hole mobility of the resulting polymers |
| ITO / poly (3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene): poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT:PSS) |
| polymer |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| hole mobility of the resulting polymers |
| ITO / PEDOT:PSS |
| MoO3 |
| Al |

Explanation:

* "corresponding hole-only devices" and "obtained by using the space charge limited current (SCLC) model" are not property values, but rather descriptions of the methods used to measure the hole mobility.
* "configuration of ITO / p oly (3, 4 -e t h y l e n e d i o x y t h i o p h e n e ) : p o ly -(styrenesulfonate) ( PEDOT : PSS ) / polymer / MoO3 / Al" is a list of materials used in the fabrication of the hole-only devices, but "polymer" is the property value representing the material whose hole mobility is being measured. Therefore, only "hole mobility of the resulting polymers", "ITO/PEDOT:PSS", "MoO3", and "Al" are valid property values.
